faq.a1: 404 Tech Found is a LATAM-focused deep-tech pre-incubator that helps founders turn breakthrough science into scalable startups through three houses: AI, Biotech, and Hardware.
faq.a2: We offer a 12-week pre-incubation program (open), a 6-month fellowship with equity-free funding (coming soon), and organize events like SpecHack, our 10-day global hackathon.
faq.a3: Founders, researchers, and technical teams from LATAM working on deep-tech projects in AI, biotech, or hardware. We look for teams with strong technical expertise and scalable impact potential.
faq.a4: We are based in Lima, Peru, but support teams across Latin America. Our programs are remote with in-person options in Lima.

ai.desc: Language models, computer vision, and autonomous agents applied to real LATAM problems.

biotech.desc: Synthetic biology, molecular diagnostics, and precision agriculture for a continent with unique biodiversity.

hardware.desc: Robotics, industrial IoT, and medical devices â€” from prototype to manufacturing.

spechack.tagline: "The hackathon where the spec is the product."
spechack.desc: 10 days. Write the spec first, build with AI second. The antidote to "vibe coding." In-person hubs + virtual track.
